text: The 2015 San Benedetto Tennis Cup is a professional tennis tournaments played on clay courts. It is the 11th edition of the tournament which is part of the 2015 ATP Challenger Tour, offering a total of €64,000+H in prize money. The event takes place in San Benedetto del Tronto, Italy, from 11 to 20 July 2015, including two days of qualifying competition. ==Singles entrants == === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 !
